author: George Berkeley

blocks.content:
THREE

DIALOGUES

between

Hylas and Philonous.

The Design of which
Is plainly to demonstrate the Reality and Perfection of Human Knowledge, the Incorporeal Nature of the Soul, and the Immediate Providence of a Deity:
In OPPOSITION to

SCEPTICS and ATHEISTS.

ALSO
To open a Method for rendring the Sciences more easy, useful, and compendious.
